name: Atari: Breakout!
description:
Atari was created by Nolan Bushnell and Ted Dabney in 1972 and became the leader in arcade games, consoles, home computers and now mobile. Beloved and world-renowned Atari games including Pong®, Asteroids®, Missile Command® and many others!

Come play this retro games classic with a twist! Play and challenge your friends or just compete against bosses in the game. Players and bosses compete on the same board to see who is the better player! Keep an eye on the clock and finish before your foe to claim glory!!!

Details:
- Choose your wager
- The same board is chosen with a timer for players to play
- Complete the board and get the highest score in the shortest time
- Challenge friends and see who is the better classic gamer!
